Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQBREASTCONT
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, QHosp AS Hospital, QContactDate AS ContactDate, QContactTime AS ContactTime, QDuration AS Duration, QContactMode AS ContactMode, QContactModeOther AS ContactModeOtherDetails, QLocation AS Location, QStage AS StageOfJourney, QReason AS XxReasonDetail, QAddRef AS XxAdditionalReferralsMade, QAddRefDetails AS AdditionalReferralDetails, QAppointments AS Appointments, QRecentContacts AS RecentContactsWithOtherHealthcareProfessionals, QNextContactDate AS NextContactDateArranged, QNotes AS Notes, QContactModePhone AS TelephoneCallDetails, QContactModeFace AS FaceToFaceDetails, QAddRefDate AS AdditionalReferralsDate, QCertProsContact AS ContactWithCertifiedProsthesisFitter, QReqInterv AS RequiredInterventionsFromBCN, QReasonDetail AS ReasonDetail, QARCertPros AS CertifiedProsthesisFitter, QARCASS AS CASS, QARPhysio AS Physiotherapist, QAROT AS OccupationalTherapist, QARDiet AS Dietitian, QARWoundSp AS WoundSpecialist, QARBCN AS BreastCareNurse, QAROther AS Other, QARCertProsDate AS CertProsDate, QARCASSDate AS CASSDate, QARPhysioDate AS PhysioDate, QAROTDate AS OTDate, QARDietDate AS DietDate, QARWSDate AS WSDate, QARBCNDate AS BCNDate, QAROtherDate AS OtherDate, QAdjChemoReg AS AdjuvantChemotherapyRegime, QAdjChemoDate AS DateCommenced, QAdjChemoDur AS DurationCycles, QAdjChemoNotes AS Notes, QRadiotherapy AS Radiotherapy, QRadioFacility AS Facility, QRadioDate AS DateCommenced, QRadioDur AS Duration, QRadioNotes AS Notes, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESCreateDate AS DateCreated, QUESCreateTime AS TimeCreated, QUESCreateUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserCreated, QUESScore AS Score, QUESStatusDR AS Status FROM questionnaire.QBREASTCONT
